Title: Baazigar
Director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla, Mastan Alibhai Burmawalla
Writer: Robin Bhatt, Akash Khurana, Javed Siddiqui
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Dalip Tahil, Rakhee Gulzar
Plot: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces his younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.
